title: Compare LCOE for Solar vs. Wind
description: An analyst needs to compare the Levelized Cost of Energy (LCOE) for a new solar project versus a new wind project at the same location.

tasks.description: Gather cost and performance data for both a 100 MW solar farm and a 100 MW wind farm (CAPEX, OPEX, capacity factor).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles the necessary input data for both project types.

tasks.description: Calculate the LCOE for the solar project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent computes the LCOE for solar.

tasks.description: Calculate the LCOE for the wind project.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent computes the LCOE for wind.

tasks.description: Present a comparison and conclude which technology offers a lower LCOE at this site.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear summary table and states that solar has a 15% lower LCOE.
